alert.note: Alert for Cimarron; Texas (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued February 20 at 2:30PM CST until February 23 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 6 PM CST TUESDAY... ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. For the High Wind Watch, southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Portions of the Panhandle of Oklahoma. Portions of the Panhandle of Texas. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, from Noon to 6 PM CST Tuesday. For the High Wind Watch, from Wednesday afternoon through Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates.
